job_tasks.phrase: Analyze complex tickets escalated by AI systems, apply human expertise to areas where AI falls short, and then close the gap by improving the AI system
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the process of interacting with an AI system, identifying its shortcomings, and then feeding that information back to improve it, which aligns with the iterative nature of prompt engineering and model improvement.

job_tasks.phrase: Review AI-generated solutions and provide detailed feedback and participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions
job_tasks.justification: Directly mentions participating in 'AI model fine-tuning sessions' and providing feedback, which is a core aspect of model development and adaptation.

job_tasks.phrase: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies
job_tasks.justification: This involves exploring and experimenting with new AI approaches, which falls under model development and research.

job_tasks.phrase: Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities to deliver exceptional customer support, focusing on complex issues that AI cannot yet fully resolve
job_tasks.justification: This describes the integration of AI capabilities into a customer support system, which is a software development and integration task.

soft_skills.phrase: Taking two whole months to get up to speed; you will be expected to ramp up one several products within the first month (we are aware this is aggressive)
soft_skills.justification: Highlights the expectation of rapid learning and adaptation to new products and systems.

soft_skills.phrase: Relying on your managers for help; if you are not adept at unblocking yourself, you will likely struggle in this role
soft_skills.justification: Emphasizes the need for self-sufficiency and problem-solving skills to overcome challenges independently.

profile.rationale: The job ad focuses heavily on tasks related to improving and fine-tuning AI models (1.B.1, 1.B.2) and integrating AI capabilities into customer support (1.A.1). While there's an integration aspect, the core responsibilities revolve around the AI's performance and improvement rather than building a broader software product around it. There are no mentions of traditional software engineering tasks like building microservices or extensive backend development. The emphasis on 'improving the AI system' and 'AI model fine-tuning sessions' points towards a specialization in GenAI rather than a balanced engineering role.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad clearly outlines responsibilities related to AI improvement and fine-tuning, which strongly suggests a GenAI Specialist profile. However, the 'Application Support Engineer' title and the mention of 'integrating AI capabilities' could imply some software engineering overlap, making it not entirely unambiguous. The salary and title might also suggest a more junior or support-oriented role than a pure specialist, but the tasks themselves are specialized.
